original_text: All these had married foreign women, and some of them had children by these wives.
korean_text: 이상은 모두 이방 여인을 아내로 맞이한 자라 그 중에는 자녀를 낳은 여인도 있었더라

sentences.original_text: All these had married foreign women
and some of them had children
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 중 일부는 자녀를 두었었다
